statements: SELECT * FROM PerformanceLogs
SELECT user_id, action, duration FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE duration > 1000
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE action = 'login'
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM PerformanceLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(duration) AS average_duration FROM PerformanceLogs
SELECT * FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, duration FROM PerformanceLogs WHERE duration > 1000 ORDER BY action ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM PerformanceLogs GROUP BY user_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(duration) AS avg_duration FROM PerformanceLogs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT action, MAX(duration) AS max_duration FROM PerformanceLogs GROUP BY action HAVING max_duration > 2000;
SELECT * FROM performance_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, query_text FROM performance_logs WHERE execution_time > 5;
SELECT log_id, query_text, execution_time FROM performance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE action = 'login' AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, action, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE execution_time > 5 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT query_text, execution_time FROM performance_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY execution_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id, action HAVING total_actions > 3 ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_activities DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE action LIKE '%login%' AND username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM performance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_message FROM performance_logs WHERE log_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage, MAX(memory_usage) AS max_memory_usage FROM system_usage;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM performance_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM performance_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_description FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM system_usage WHERE cpu_usage > 50 AND memory_usage > 30 ORDER BY usage_id;
SELECT usage_timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM system_usage WHERE usage_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM log_data;
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM log_data WHERE execution_time > 5;
SELECT dbms_name, cpu_utilization FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY cpu_utilization DESC;
SELECT query_id, optimization_steps FROM optimization_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT db_name, db_version FROM database_info WHERE created_on < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY execution_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT query_id, query_text FROM log_data WHERE execution_time > 5.0 AND query_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT dbms_name, AVG(cpu_utilization) AS avg_cpu_utilization FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY dbms_name HAVING AVG(cpu_utilization) > 70;
SELECT db_name, db_version, created_on FROM database_info WHERE db_version LIKE 'MySQL%' ORDER BY created_on ASC;
SELECT query_id, MAX(optimization_steps) AS max_steps FROM optimization_data WHERE query_id = 202 GROUP BY query_id;
SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, query FROM log_data WHERE log_id > 1000;
SELECT log_id, user_id, query FROM log_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT log_id, log_time, user_id, query FROM log_data WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM log_data ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, query FROM log_data WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'CPU%' ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_time
SELECT error_id, error_message, error_time FROM error_logs WHERE error_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
